H0.text: Who, with 84 goals in 85 games is Hungary’s highest international goal scorer. Ferenc Puskás

H1.text: Who, with 84 goals in 85 games is Hungary’s highest international goal scorer. Sándor Kocsis

H2.text: Who, with 84 goals in 85 games is Hungary’s highest international goal scorer. Nándor Hidegkuti

H3.text: Who, with 84 goals in 85 games is Hungary’s highest international goal scorer. Ocsi

A4.text: Puskás played 85 games and scored 84 times for Hungary.
